title: Re-run mana tapping analysis with 30+ post-feature games
description:
Precondition: at least 81 total exported games in website/public/games/ (currently 51). Only 11 games post-date the mana_plan feature (commit 74a49b5af0, 2026-02-12 22:43).

Once we have 30+ more games, re-run the mana tapping analysis script filtering to games after the mana_plan commit:

  uv run python scripts/analysis/mana_tapping.py website/public/games/

Analyze only games with timestamp >= 20260212_224324. Report findings on:
- How often LLMs use mana_plan vs auto_tap
- mana_plan success/failure rate by model
- Whether certain models should default to auto_tap
- Whether mana_plan is worth keeping or should be simplified/removed

Include the findings in the PR description and update this issue accordingly.
